name: Outer Signal
description:
Description

"Outer Signal" is an exciting rhythm game that transports players to a comic book-inspired world. The game begins with a dramatic cutscene where humanity receives a mysterious signal from space, and the player takes on the role of the responding signal. With a focus on accuracy, players must navigate the rhythm of each song, signaling in time to the beat. The game also features a powerful modding system, allowing players to customize and enhance their experience even further. Whether you're a seasoned rhythm gamer or a newcomer to the genre, "Outer Signal" promises to deliver an immersive, unforgettable experience.

Controls
  • When  is in the center of , press
  • Buttons with such an outline  are clickable
